data.description: About CarrierCarrier Global Corporation, global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, is committed to creating solutions that matter for people and our planet for generations to come. From the beginning, we've led in inventing new technologies and entirely new industries. Today, we continue to lead because we have a world-class, diverse workforce that puts the customer at the center of everything we do. For more information, visit corporate.carrier.com or follow Carrier on social media at @Carrier.About this RoleCarrier has an opening for a Computer Science Major or Software Engineering Major to serve as a vital member of the eDesign team. This team is responsible for developing and maintaining software-based tools used to design and optimize the energy efficiency of Heating, Ventilating, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) systems for commercial buildings. eDesign tools are used by thousands of engineering firms worldwide in their business. This position is based in Syracuse, NY.The candidate’s responsibilities include but are not limited to:Developing desktop application software for HVAC system design and energy modeling.Analyzing software requirements and designing software solutions.Coding to implement solutions.Working collaboratively with other developers for planning, design & code review, test planning, etc.Performing unit and system testing.Participating in Agile development process.Participating in team project meetings.Evaluating and identifying new libraries, tools, and technologies for use by the software development team, as needed.Basic QualificationsMust be currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or any engineering field (Junior or Senior Level).Must have an overall GPA of 3.0 or higher.Must be eligible to work in the US without sponsorship.Experience & QualificationsPrevious internship experience preferred.Demonstrated experience working on independent, self-motivated tasks, with excellent problem-solving skills.Experience with software development principles and processesExcellent verbal, writing, and presentation communication skills.Proficiency with C# and .NETUnderstanding of object-oriented design and analysis (OOD and OOA)Technology experience including Microsoft Visual Studio, SQL, JSON, WPF, XAML.RSRCAR Pay Range The salary for this position is between $36,750– $127,500 annually. Carrier is An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.Job Applicant's Privacy Notice:Click on this link to read the Job Applicant's Privacy Notice
requirements: Analyzing software requirements and designing software solutions.
Must be currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or any engineering field (Junior or Senior Level).
Must have an overall GPA of 3.0 or higher.
responsibilities: Developing desktop application software for HVAC system design and energy modeling.
Working collaboratively with other developers for planning, design & code review, test planning, etc.
Evaluating and identifying new libraries, tools, and technologies for use by the software development team, as needed.
Experience with software development principles and processes
